title: Disappearing Destinations: How to Travel Sustainably
description: Venice, Maldives, The Great Barrier Reef, the Amazon, Machu Picchu, Patagonia - all bucket list destinations which tourism is playing a role in their destruction due to climate change, over tourism, deforestation, coral bleaching etc.. In this episode Nissy speaks with former NY Times correspondent and Author Elizabeth Becker, one of the pioneers in coverage of overtourism. We give tips about how travelers can explore responsibly to limit damage, use tourism dollars for good and visit destinations sustainably.
